item.title: FDA approves Eli Lilly's weight loss drug Zepbound for sleep apnea, expanding use in U.S.
item.description: The agency's decision expands the use of Zepbound and could potentially pave the way for Eli Lilly to gain broader insurance coverage for the treatmen...

item.title: Elon Musk endorses far-right Alternative for Germany party in upcoming election
item.description: While he gains power in the incoming Trump administration, Elon Musk is using his influence elsewhere, endorsing a far-right party in Germany.

item.title: A Santa Claus rally could come just in time next week to help stocks end the year on a high note
item.description: Investors will measure the response to this week's selloff, which came at a time when markets are entering a strong seasonal period.

item.title: What a government shutdown could mean for air travel
item.description: A government shutdown could mean thousands of air traffic controllers and TSA agents would go without paychecks.

item.title: Starbucks baristas strike in three U.S. cities during pre-Christmas rush
item.description: Starbucks baristas are striking in Los Angeles, Chicago and Seattle.
